# The `WebAssemblyLowerRefTypesIntPtrConv.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Lowers IntToPtr and PtrToInt instructions on reference types to Trap instructions since they have been allowed to operate on non-integral pointers. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Lowers IntToPtr and PtrToInt instructions on reference types to Trap instructions since they have been allowed to operate on non-integral pointers.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and its uses by null in the case of inttoptr and 0 in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// case of ptrtoint.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
